cleaned_text: Goddess Energy Crystal Intention Oil $10.50 This variant is currently sold out This crystal intention oil is made with pure rose oil, infused with the highest quality rose quartz to unlock your true goddess energy. An aromatic experience of floral fragrance to inspire and boost your self-love, these divine energy crystals will deepen your spiritual connection. The perfect addition to your meditation and healing practice. Ingredients: Sweet almond oil, fractioned coconut oil, rosa damascena oil, organic rose buds and petals. This oil (on dropper version) is excellent for anointment oil. Our oils are 100% vegan and handmade.
